English.Name: Whirlpool
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Inflicts damage on the target. It may
also afflict the targeted enemy with a
[LS:13592]Constriction[LE] status condition, making it
incapable of movement. It will inflict
double damage on a [LS:13628]Diving[LE] target.

Select detail:[CLUM_SET:70][M:B4] or [M:B5]/View detail: [M:B2]
